notes.text:
This update for libvpx fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-0034: Fixed out-of-bounds read on truncated key frames (bsc#1166066)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: In vp8_decode_frame of decodeframe.c, there is a possible out of bounds read due to improper input validation. This could lead to remote information disclosure if error correction were turned on, with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-8.0 Android-8.1Android ID: A-62458770
notes.title: Vulnerability description
